thread.section_title: Melia Vendome - Paris - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very lovely stay
thread.title_full: Very lovely stay - Review of Melia Vendome - Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Ayumi8888
title: Very lovely stay
text:
It was my mom's first time in Paris so the comfort and the convenience of the hotel we stay were very important to me. I am very happy I chose Melia Vendôme.
The location is just perfect, it is in the heart of Paris, close to everything but at the same time the property was very quiet. The room is very nice with a comfortable bed so we were able to rest well.
The staff always pleasantly greeted us every time we passed the lobby, which was very nice.. I felt like they were making efforts to make guests' stay pleansent and comfortable.
They also work well in team so if something comes up during the night, they share about it with their colleagues who work in the morning.
Thank you and we would definitely come back on our next visit!
母にとって初めてのパリだったので、ホテル選びに気を使いましたがMelia Vendômeにして正解でした。お部屋もロケーションも良かったです。スタッフの方も挨拶をきちんとしてくれますし、接客に関して努力しているように見受けられました。また次も泊まりたいです。
